description:
Rina offers Touya a part time job "Helping out her manager."
It starts tomorrow, she says, and he can do it without quitting his job at Echoes.
Touya cancels his job as a tutor, more out of a desire to see Yuki than interest in the job itself.
When he goes to the studio the next day, Rina`s manager is fired, and Eiji promotes him from help to official manager despite his inexperience.
But his manner during the recording offends Rina, and she becomes infuriated at him.
What does Rina really think?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hand in Hand, Shoulder to Shoulder, Back to Back, and Then... We Don`t Have to Take Off Our Clothes.
Te to Te, Kata to Kata, Senaka to Senaka, Sore kara. Fuku no Ue kara datte Iinda
手と手, 肩と肩, 背中と背中, それから. 服の上からだっていいんだ
